meanings.definition: Having bad luck or unfortunate circumstances.
meanings.sent1: She felt very unlucky when she lost her favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: It was an unlucky day for him as he missed the bus to work.
meanings.sent3: The unlucky cat got stuck in a tree and needed help getting down.
meanings.sent4: The unlucky penny brought nothing but trouble wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: The unlucky student always seemed to forget their homework at home.

meanings.definition: Not favored by fortune; unsuccessful; having bad fortune.
meanings.sent1: He was feeling quite unlucky after failing his math test.
meanings.sent2: The unlucky gambler lost all his money at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The unlucky plant wilted despite being watered regularly.
meanings.sent4: The unlucky charm seemed to bring misfortune to whoever wore it.
meanings.sent5: The unlucky explorer stumbled upon a hidden treasure by accident.
